metadata.title: CVE-2024-35915 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nfc: nci: Fix uninit-value in nci_dev_up and nci_ntf_packetsyzbot reported the following uninit-value access issue [1][2]:nci_rx_work() parses and processes received packet. When the payloadlength is zero, each message type handler reads uninitialized payloadand KMSAN detects this issue. The receipt of a packet with a zero-sizepayload is considered unexpected, and therefore, such packets should besilently discarded.This patch resolved this issue by checking payload size before callingeach message type handler codes.
